about.title: About Us
about.p1: Tagsi is a startup founded to make urban transportation more shared, fair, and technological.
about.p2: With our human-centric approach, we aim to build a trust-based platform between passengers and drivers.
about.p3: For us, Tagsi is not just an app; it's a way to move smarter in cities.
about.metaDesc: Learn about Tagsi. We are working to make urban transportation more efficient and sustainable.

corporate.title: Corporate
corporate.missionDesc: Our shared ride approach contributes to reducing the number of vehicles in traffic and indirectly lowering fuel consumption and carbon emissions.
corporate.careerDesc: At Tagsi, we believe in producing and growing together.
corporate.visionDesc: To be a leading travel platform that makes urban transportation more sustainable, sharing-oriented, and accessible for everyone.
corporate.howItWorksDesc: Tagsi digitally matches drivers and passengers with the same route. Payments occur between parties; the platform takes no commission.
corporate.metaDesc: Tagsi corporate information, mission, and career opportunities.

safety.title: Safety
safety.subtitle: Safety is one of the fundamental building blocks of Tagsi.
safety.p1: Drivers on the platform go through identity and vehicle verification processes. The process proceeds transparently with live location tracking during the trip, passenger-driver rating system, and in-app support mechanisms.
safety.p2: At Tagsi, we prioritize creating a safe environment for both passengers and drivers.

features.trackingDesc: All your trips are tracked and recorded in real-time.
features.identityDesc: All our drivers go through a detailed identity and vehicle verification process.
features.ratingDesc: A transparent experience with the passenger-driver rating system.
features.supportDesc: We are with you with in-app support mechanisms throughout the journey.
features.shareDesc: Share your journey with your loved ones instantly.
features.emergencyDesc: Call for help immediately with the in-app emergency button.

safety.metaDesc: Safety is a fundamental pillar of Tagsi. Identity verification, live tracking, and in-app support.
